title.rendered: Handyband 4m Stretched  Conforming Elastic Gauze Bandage 7.5cm x 1.5m, Pack of 12

content.rendered:
Handyband Conforming is a light, soft, white elastic bandage for dressing retention on high body movement areas such as joints. Ideal for active patients, HandybandConforming is cool and low-bulk. Ideal for use when adhesive products need to be avoided.

Features and Benefits

  • White
  • Conformable
  • Light, low bulk and cool
  • Soft for added patient comfort
  • Durable

Indications

  • Bandage retention on high-body-movement areas such as jopints.
  • Use where very light, comforable dressing retention is required.
  • Active patients and prolonged use.
